description: This file defines the AuthState class, a state management class for user authentication in a Flutter application. It manages user login, registration, logout, and authentication status, using an injected AuthService.

classes.name: AuthState
classes.description: Manages user authentication state, handling login, registration, logout, and state notifications.

methods.name: AuthState
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the AuthState with an instance of AuthService.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Checks if the user is already authenticated and updates the state accordingly.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and name; updates auth state upon success.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password; updates auth state upon success.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user and resets the authentication state.

methods.name: clearError
methods.description: Clears any existing error message in the auth state.
